mapper.select: select * from itemboard ib, item i, store s where ib.item_no = i.item_no and ib.store_no = s.store_no and ib.item_no = #{item_no}
mapper.insert: insert into oorder (oorder_no, member_no, item_no, oorder_date) values (#{oorder_no}, #{member_no}, #{item_no}, sysdate)
insert into pay (pay_no, pay_price, pay_usepoint, pay_date, oorder_no) values ((select max(pay_no) from pay)+1, #{pay_price}, #{pay_usepoint}, sysdate, #{oorder_no})

insert into delivery (delivery_no, delivery_name, delivery_ph, delivery_address, delivery_address2, delivery_contents, oorder_no) values ((select max(delivery_no) from delivery)+1, #{delivery_name},#{delivery_ph},#{delivery_address},#{delivery_address2}, #{delivery_contents},#{oorder_no})
